abstract: Study in journal Science Translational Medicine reports successful use of human antibodies to treat Hendra and Nipah, two recently-discovered and deadly viruses.
snippet: The treatment protected monkeys in tests and may have saved two lives in an emergency case, researchers reported.
lead_paragraph: The treatment protected monkeys in tests and may have saved two lives in an emergency case, researchers reported.

headline.main: Hendra and Nipah: Antibody Treatment for 2 Deadly Viruses Shows Promise in Tests and an Emergency
headline.print_headline: Hendra and Nipah: Antibody Treatment for 2 Deadly Viruses Shows Promise in Tests and an Emergency
headline.seo: Antibody for Hendra and Nipah Viruses Shows Promise
